name: jaws-festa-memory-upload-infrastructure
description: AWS CDK infrastructure for JAWS FESTA Memory Upload application

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=dev --profile default
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=prod --profile prod --require-approval never
scripts.diff:dev: npm run build && cdk diff --context environment=dev --profile default
scripts.diff:prod: npm run build && cdk diff --context environment=prod --profile prod
scripts.synth:dev: npm run build && cdk synth --context environment=dev
scripts.synth:prod: npm run build && cdk synth --context environment=prod
scripts.setup:dev: npm install && npm run bootstrap:dev && npm run deploy:dev
scripts.setup:prod: npm install && npm run bootstrap:prod && npm run deploy:prod
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run test && npm run synth:dev
scripts.validate:prod: npm run build && npm run test && npm run synth:prod

author: JAWS-UG
